categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Mission to Rescue Doctor Bledsoe was a mission tasked by Colonel Darkstone to rescue Doctor Bledsoe from the Rebel Alliance.

The Corellian Corvette instance appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Corellian Corvette was added to the game with the release of an update on April 13, 2004.
